translations.footerText: Thank you for checking out my portfolio. For any business inquiries please feel free to contact me via email or linkedin.

hero.name: Hi, my name is <2>Amanuel Zewdie.</2>
hero.currently: Currently, I'm taking a course at <2>Integrify</2>.

about.first:
Hello there! My name is Amanuel and i enjoy problem solving, and creating software
products that are visually appealing, acessible and user-friendly. My interest in web
development first grew back in 2018 when i decided to learn HTML & CSS so i could
learn to make my own website.
about.second: Since then, i have obtained my degree in information technology. I have also had the privilige of doing an internship as a frontend developer for a <2>social media company</2> that connects dancers worldwide. I have also done an internship for a non-profit <6>organization</6> that helps refugees find accommodation. Today, my main focus is to further expand my knowledge by learning more about the web at <10>integrify</10>.
about.techSubtitle: Here are a few technologies i have been using recently.

one.title: Personal Project
one.name: Weather App
one.description:
A Weather App that sends daily or monthly weather updates for the next day.
Users Can specify the city for which they want to recieve weather updates.

two.title: School Project
two.name: LeViteZer
two.description: A gimbal and camera control system built using the <2>LeViteZer protocol/box</2>. The software is a web-based version of the LeViteZer user interface used for camera, lens and gimbal control.

three.title: Fullstack Project
three.name: Patientor
three.description: This project was done as part of the<1> fullstack open 2022 course</1> provided by the University of Helsinki. Patientor is a simple medical record application for doctors who handle diagnoses and basic health information of their patients. The website allows you to add and monitor patients and their diagnoses

contact.subTitle: Submit the form below to get in touch with me
